description: This file implements utility functions for the Slap Env Controller Object, including a function to create the environment controller object, and contains licensing and module description comments.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SlapCreateEnvController(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates and returns a new Slap Env Controller object handle, passing container, owner, and reserved context handles to the creator function.
